comment: Awesome professor! Beside her great and comprehensible teaching style, Dr. Hodges is absolutely one of the nicest ladies I have ever met in my life. She cares about your learning much more than your grades, very helpful inside and outside of the class, even when you're done with her course, you can still ask her for help. In 1 word, SHE'S PERFECT!

Hands down this is the best teacher in engineering PERIOD. She grades fairly, she actually likes helping students out, and shes makes learning fun. Took her for multiple classes. Definately recommended
Dr. Hodges is very helpful and willing to listen to the students.  She explains the material well, and she tests on things she teaches in class.  Take her class if you can.
